posts.title: Selfies Photo Album
posts.content: Take your selfies to a new dimension – the 3rd dimension – by framing them in the selfies photo album. This novelty album lets you showcase your  32 best selfies and features a creative cover with a mirror on the phone screen ideal for self adoration.

posts.title: Beer Mug Bottle Opener
posts.content: Keep the alcohol flowing all night long – or until your liver fails you – by popping open your brews with the beer mug bottle opener. When the mug is empty, you simply flip it over and pop open another fresh brew using the functional bottle opener on the bottom.

posts.title: Stormproof Matches
posts.content: Get a life-saving fire going in the most inhospitable and wet environments by using these stormproof matches. Ideal for the great outdoors, the matches burn for around 15 seconds and come in a durable, waterproof container with a built-in striker on the side.

posts.title: Caffeinated Shaving Cream
posts.content: Give your morning routine a little extra kick by lathering up with this caffeinated shaving cream. Made from all natural ingredients, it’s fortified with rich antioxidants to help reduce the appearance of redness and keep you feeling fresh and energized.

posts.title: Watermelon Knife
posts.content: The first slice of watermelon will taste better than ever when you cut it with the watermelon knife. This functional novelty knife makes slicing watermelon a blast. It features a razor sharp Japanese carbon steel blade whimsically designed with seed-shaped accents.

posts.title: Sting & Bite Venom Sucker
posts.content: Reduce the discomfort caused by bug stings using this sting and bite venom sucker next time you get bit. This chemical free device provides immediate itch relief and reduces swelling by naturally removing bug poison from your body.

posts.title: Multi-Color Swirl Icing Coupler
posts.content: Make your homemade treats look more mouth-watering than ever before using this multi-color swirl icing coupler. It lets you effortlessly create professional looking multi-colored swirls with either two or three different colors.

posts.title: Teddy Bear Sandwich Mold
posts.content: Make lunchtime fun for the little ones by transforming their meals using the teddy bear sandwich mold. Ideal for fussy eaters, the mold allows you to turn any slice of bread into an adorable little 3D teddy bear that keeps them company as they chow down.

posts.title: Glow In The Dark Slime Kit
posts.content: Keep your little mad scientist entertained for hours on end with this glow in the dark slime kit. The kit includes everything necessary to easily whip up a brightly colored gooey and slippery green slime that glows in the dark – simply add water to the powder and stir.

posts.title: The Infant Survival Guide
posts.content: Get a leg up on the whole parenting thing by studying “The Infant Survival Guide”. Perfect for newbie parents, it comes filled with helpful tips and tricks such as the proper spot to place your baby while you’re doing chores.

posts.title: The Scratch & Sniff Guide to Beer
posts.content: To truly know a beer, it isn’t enough to just taste it. Become a beer connoisseur with the Scratch & Sniff Guide to Beer. This intriguing read is divided into eight chapters that each introduce you to a different aspect of this beloved and oh-so-satisfying drink.

posts.title: Resistance Training Parachute
posts.content: Harness the power of wind drag to make yourself into the fastest being on two legs using the resistance training parachute. The parachute allows for limited mobility as it tears away the weakness in you and replaces it with increased stamina and acceleration.
